import React, { useState } from "react"; function AddContactForm() { const [contactsObject, setContactsObject] = useState([]); const handleChangeContactObject = (e) => { setContactsObject({ ...contactsObject, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return ( <>
handleChangeContactObject(e)} maxLength="50" />
handleChangeContactObject(e)} maxLength="50" />
handleChangeContactObject(e)} maxLength="50" />
handleChangeContactObject(e)} maxLength="50" />
); } export default AddContactForm;
